Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_010_1.Text: *: Behold, the public baths! Enter, wanderer, and cleanse thyself!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_1.Text: *: Behold, the public baths! Enter, wanderer, and cleanse thyself! You will find doing so in the morn rather pleasant!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_010_1.Text: *: Lo, the Goddess is our light, our radiance... And the Lord of the Underworld the darkness...the night...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_010_2.Text: *: Long have the light and the darkness<--->the wellsprings of all power<--->done battle... Yea, since the very dawn of time...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_010_3.Text: *: But obtain the Sphere of Light, and the dark lord's power might be checked at last... The battle might yet be ended...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_1.Text: *: Lo, Zoma is slain, and the passageway he wrought by main force into the other realm closed...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_2.Text: *: The land of Alefgard steppeth, with much blinking and rubbing of eyes, into the light of dawn...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010_3.Text: *: But alas, thy way home...this too is lost... Thou art destined to end thy days here... To lay thy bones to rest in Alefgard's soil...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320_010_1.Text: *: Whisperings reach mine ears... I hear tell of holy Rubiss trapped within a tower atop an isle in the ocean west of here.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010_1.Text: *: The Lord of the Underworld is truly slain? Verily, thou art mighty indeed!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420_010_1.Text: *: Hast thou heard tell of the Sword of Kings, perchance? Nay? 'Twas a miraculous blade of surpassing power! Alas, the legends tell that it was rent asunder by a great devil, and its pieces strewn hither and yon.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0420_010_2.Text: *: But so unyieldingly was the weapon wrought that the devil spent fully three years in its breaking.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010_1.Text: *: From the bottom of my heart, I do thank thee. Thou hast brought the dawn at last!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520_010_1.Text: *: The master of the item shop is an artificer of the subtlest skill.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0520_010_2.Text: *: I did once hear tell that he was in fact a smithee of no little reputation in a past life. One wonders why he ceased plying his trade...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010_1.Text: *: Lo...the light! Never have I seen it so bright... 'Tis like unto a dream!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_010_1.Text: *: Peace is ours! Now commerce may begin again in earnest!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_010_2.Text: *: Though the trade in weapons and armour may now be somewhat diminished...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0720_010_1.Text: *: Thou art welcome in the village of Kol, wanderer.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010_1.Text: *: Hast thou truly vanquished the Lord of the Underworld?

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010_2.Text: *: Thou hast? Then it is as we had thought!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010_3.Text: *: Bear thee not false witness, friend. It befitteth not our saviour.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010_4.Text: *: When first the light returned, we knew at once what it must signify.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0710_010_5.Text: *: Zoma is fallen! All hail the saviour!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820_010_1.Text: *: Oh, that the faerie flute might fall into my hands. Then might I free holy Rubiss from the cursed statue that bindeth Her...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820_020_1.Text: *: Hm? What say'st thou? Thou hast freed holy Rubiss from Her bondage!?

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820_020_2.Text: *: O Rubiss, mother of all life, guardian of hill and dale, of soil and sea...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0820_020_3.Text: *: Though Thou art freed already, may I yet serve Thee in any way Thou seest fit...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_010_1.Text: *: The man in the item shop upstairs, who speaketh ever of the land of <6>Jipang<9><--->he seemeth strangely stricken.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_010_2.Text: *: Wherefore, on such a day for celebration as this?

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920_010_1.Text: *: Greetings, young one. Thou hast come to soothe thine aches, I trust. Wouldst thou be displeased perchance to soak with me?

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920_010_2.Text: *: Tsk! Verily, the young of this age are changed. Thou know'st not that thou art born!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920_010_3.Text: *: Splendid! Though, doth the water seem to thee too cold, perchance?

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920_010_4.Text: *: Yea, the fault lieth with the darkness which smothereth the land.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0920_010_5.Text: *: Ahh, for a day when we might at last enjoy a steaming-hot bath once more!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0910_010_1.Text: *: Ahh... Such heat... Lo, 'tis an exquisite heat... A healing heat...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0910_010_2.Text: *: And it is to the light of the world that we must give thanks for its being. And to thee. Ahh... (burble)

Txt_Talk_Myra_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_020_1.Text: *: O benevolent Goddess! Thy will hath been done by <IfSolo(this,these)>, thy humble servant<IfSolo(,s)>! Let all men give thanks unto Thee!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_1.Text: *: Thou art a true hero, friend!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_2.Text: *: The dread Lord of the Underworld is no more! Oh, happy day! Bless <IfSolo(thy,your)> heroic <IfSolo(soul,souls)>!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_1020_020_2.Text: *: Wassat? Oh, them lot are all off diggin' some tunnel way down south in this marshy spot. Didn't fancy it meself, so I took the day off!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_1020_020_3.Text: *: Ever since I got split up from the boss I've been takin' on odd jobs just to make ends meet.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_1020_010_1.Text: *: Two of me pals are way down south toilin' away in this tunnel there<--->fink they said it was near a poisonous swamp. Go and say 'ello if ya feel up to it.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_1020_010_2.Text: *: I bet they'll be chuffed to see a familiar face down 'ere.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_010_1.Text: *: Well, well, if it ain't the <IfGender_LEADER(man,woman,)> of the moment! I 'eard you sent the big, bad Zoma 'imself packin'!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Inn_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_010_2.Text: *: Finkin' I'll celebrate by takin' all the lads to go and see the boss.

Txt_Talk_Myra_House_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_010.Text:
*: Orochi's ransom...
I was to be sacrificed...
No choice but to flee...

*: Driftwood on the tide...
We washed up on this world's shore...
Worn, yet unbroken...

*: Jipang's great swordsmith...
My husband; lost his hammer...
Please, visit his shop...

Txt_Talk_Myra_House_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_020.Text:
*: Thank you, kind stranger...
My husband fulfilled at last...
Life shines once again...

*: We long for Jipang...
Yet hope fills our hearts anew...
This is wonderful...

*: Now we may live here...
To our fullest potential...
We wish you well, hero...

Txt_Talk_Myra_House_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text:
*: The light of the dawn...
How could I forget its grace...?
Rolling through the fields...

*: But in old Jipang...
There, too, was a golden dawn...
One now lost to me...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_0.Text: *: Oh, I'm such an idiot! That blasted Robbin' 'Ood sold me <IndefSgl_I_NAME2> which he swore was <DefSgl_I_NAME>!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_0.Text: *: This is absolutely brilliant! Now that the land is free of monsters, we can trade again!
*: Speaking of which, I don't suppose you'd be willing to sell me that rather lovely sword of yours...would you?
*: Ha ha! Just pulling your leg, of course!
*: Though I would love nothing more than to own the blade that slayed the dark lord, I'm not nearly heroic enough to deserve such a treasure.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0220_0.Text: *: The master of the item shop above claimeth to hail from a land named Jipang. But none hath heard of such a place...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_0.Text: *: Thou art a true hero, friend!
*: Is't true? Is the dread Lord of the Underworld no more? ...Oh, happy day! Bless thy heroic soul!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320_0.Text: *: The legends tell that the Sword of Kings was wrought from stoutest orichalcum. But where might such a substance be found?

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_1F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_0.Text: *: O benevolent Goddess! Thy will hath been done by <IfSolo(this,these)>, thy humble servant<IfSolo(,s)>! Let all men give thanks unto Thee!

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_0.Text:
I was a swordsmith...
In my beautiful homeland...
True bliss I did know...

Until Orochi...
The fiend ruined all our lives...
My bliss in tatters...

She came for my wife...
Demanded her sacrifice...
So we fled Jipang...

I lost everything...
My ancestor's tools all gone...
Oh, my prized hammer...

Alas, with no tools...
I cannot do my old job...
So I sell items...

Welcome to my shop...
I wish to be of service...
What do you require...
Pardon? You have brought me <DefSgl_I_NAME>?
Incredible! Yes, this is it without a doubt! But how did you<--->
No, you do not need to say. All that matters is that my family's prized possession has returned to me.
However can I begin to repay you for such a kindness... Do not worry, I will find a way someday.
Legend has it that this hammer was once used to temper a blade most holy long, long ago.
I just hope I can put it to use for you one day.
Ah, it is a pleasure to see you again.
I have been able to expand my range of wares thanks to you bringing the hammer back to me.
Please do take a look at them.
I actually heard of an ore named <Sgl_I_NAME> the other day. They say it is the strongest rock in existence.
My father always said our hammer could be used on any material in the whole world.
Makes me wonder if that applies even to <Sgl_I_NAME>...
What I wouldn't give for the chance to work with such an ore. Then I would know how skilled a swordsmith I truly am!
...Oh, but my apologies. I got a bit carried away there.
I do wonder if my hammer could be used to create something with <Sgl_I_NAME>...
Ah, my apologies. I was just thinking aloud.
Ah, it is a pleasure to see you again.
I should mention that one of the people here told me of a sword of legend the other day.
Apparently, it was once housed in a castle before being stolen and smashed by the Lord of the Underworld. Such a waste of a fine blade...
I would dare say that if the sword still remains, I could mend it with my family's hammer.
If this legendary sword still remains, I could likely mend it with my family's hammer.
Yes, I am sure of it.
Oh, my apologies. I should not think aloud so much.

Welcome to my shop...
I wish to be of service...
What do you require...
Wait, that sword...
I have never seen a blade of its like in my life. Just look at that splendid hue...
Truly magnificent to behold!
And yet how did it come to be in such a state? Broken clean in two...
Oh, but what is that sticking out of your bag?
Why this ore... Just look at it! There can be no doubt it was used in the crafting of your sword.
Ah, so you came to me hoping that I might be able to mend your weapon...
It would be an honour. I have never worked with such an ore till now, but it is time I repaid you for ridding my people of the fiend Orochi.
You have my word I will restore the blade to its former glory. This is what I was born to do!
Then, the following day...
Here it is. Please treat it with the respect it deserves.
{HERO} obtains the Sword of Kings!
Oh, I could not accept any monetary reward for this.
You see, I used to fiercely rue the fact that we ended up in this village.
But now it is clear why we were brought here. It had to be this way.
I can say with confidence that this is why I became a swordsmith.
May that blade serve you well on your travels.
And should you be willing, do stop by my shop from time to time. I would love to lay eyes on that sword again.

Txt_Talk_Myra_Shop_2F_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_0.Text:
My former home fades...
I turn and face a new land...
Heart heavy, soul free...

Txt_Talk_Myra_Well_SUB_0_ACTOR_0010_010_.Text: ...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!
{LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
